translation.en: [woman] Ladies and gentlemen, we are live at the grand opening
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, estamos en vivo desde la gran inauguración

translation.en: of Ishaya Bello's first art exhibition.
translation.es: de la primera exposición de Ishaya Bello.

translation.en: Who would have thought that the dreams of a young boy…
translation.es: ¿Quién pensaría que los sueños de un chico de Lagos

translation.en: [in Yoruba] …from Lagos Island would become this?
I always dreamt of being an artist, of being Essien,
translation.es: Siempre quise ser artista como Essien.

translation.en: and I got a chance to work with him as an apprentice in London,
translation.es: Tuve la oportunidad de ser su aprendiz en Londres,

translation.en: and, boy, he changed my life.
Also I'd like to thank my friends.
You're late for work. Mum is waiting outside. She's very angry.
translation.es: Vas tarde. Mamá te espera afuera enojada.

translation.en: [Patricia in Yoruba] Ishaya, we are already late. Will you stop dragging your feet?

translation.es: El hijo de la Sra. Patricia.

translation.en: Sister, fine drawing for your wall, ma, for your wall.
translation.es: Compre una obra hermosa para su casa.

translation.en: -I painted it myself, it's original. Ma! -[woman] I don't want.
Mama, painting for your fine wall in your house.
translation.es: Compre un cuadro para su casa.

translation.en: I painted it by myself, ma. It's a fine work.
translation.es: Lo pinté yo. Es una obra hermosa.

translation.en: Sir, you can buy this drawing. I drew it myself.
It's original work from me, sir! Sir!
[Michael in Pidgin] Why are you so eager to sell your art?
I need money quickly. [in English] Money for what?
[in Pidgin] Have you got someone pregnant?
Okay, talk to me, what's going on?
Essien. He has this art fellowship…
translation.es: Sí, Essien. Tiene una beca de arte

translation.en: to study with him for six months.
translation.es: para estudiar con él seis meses.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Don't lie. Let me see your face. You're lying.
I said he picked… Come see the video.
translation.es: Te dije que me escogió. Mira el video.

translation.en: [in English] Dear Ishaya, if you're watching this video…
translation.es: - Querido Ishaya, si ves este video… - Mira.

translation.en: You have been selected as one of my apprentices in London.
translation.es: Te escogieron para ser uno de mis aprendices en Londres.

translation.en: You'll get the required training, expertise,
and exposure to start your career
translation.es: y orientación para empezar tu carrera

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Wow, my guy, you did it!
-How come you didn't tell me? -Shh! Quiet.
-You're traveling to London? -That's what I'm trying to arrange.
Before you say "Queen Elizabeth", you'll be in London sipping tea with her.
translation.es: Antes de lo que cante un gallo, tomarás el té con la reina.

translation.en: Queen Elizabeth. Queen Elizabeth. Am I in London now?
translation.es: ¡Cocorocó! ¡Cocorocó! - Estoy en Londres. - Calma. Irás a Londres.

translation.en: [Michael] Calm down. You'll go to London.
translation.es: - Estoy en Londres. - Calma. Irás a Londres.

translation.en: My clients will buy your artwork.
Let me take a bath and get ready for Rahila's birthday party.
translation.es: Me alistaré para la fiesta de Rahila.

translation.en: -What? -[Ishaya] Shit, I haven't bought the cake.
-[in English] What are you doing here? -Go and sit down.
[in Pidgin] Rahila, your cake is here.
Hi! Wait till you see what I got.
-[in Pidgin] What is this? -Come on, Ishaya.
[in Pidgin] So she will attract friends. I don't want these for her, looks like clothes for a prostitute.
translation.es: - Así hará amigos. - No, así se visten las prostitutas.

translation.en: -It's not bad, I like it. -I know you'll like this. Naughty!
translation.es: A mí me gusta. - Por supuesto, travieso. - Gracias.

translation.en: -[in English] Thank you. -[both muttering and laughing]
Are you OK? [in Yoruba] Want to go to the bedroom?
[Adufe in English] Rahila, your dream school advert is on.
translation.es: Rahila, el anuncio de tu escuela soñada.

translation.en: we are all about giving back to the society that raised us.
translation.es: aportamos a la sociedad que nos vio crecer.

translation.en: Do you want to win a scholarship to the most prestigious School in Nigeria?
translation.es: ¿Quieren ganarse una beca en la escuela más prestigiosa de Nigeria?

translation.en: For those of you who want to come to Wilmer Academy, here's your chance.
translation.es: Si quieren estudiar en la Academia Wilmer, esta es su oportunidad.

translation.en: Come to the Wilmer Academy Open Day and register for the scholarship exam,
translation.es: Asiste al día abierto al público y regístrate para tomar el examen,

translation.en: Hey, now, Mummy, I was watching it!
[in Yoruba] Don't waste your time. Attending that school is a futile dream.
translation.es: No pierdas el tiempo. Estudiar ahí es un sueño imposible.

translation.en: [in English] My dear daughter, today's your birthday, hmm?
[in Yoruba] Did you hear? Don't frown.
translation.es: Estemos alegres, ¿sí? No hagas mala cara.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] You know I can't draw your dream every day.
translation.es: No puedo seguir dibujando tu sueño.

translation.en: [in English] Chase it now so you don't regret it later.
My dreams are too expensive. Plus, I don't even think I belong there.
translation.es: Mis sueños son muy caros. No creo que pertenezca a ese lugar.
Los sueños poco realistas son nocivos.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Tomorrow is their Open Day, right?
Register for the scholarship exam. I mean, you never know.
translation.es: Regístrate para el examen de la beca. Nunca se sabe.

translation.en: Look, I'm too busy following my own dreams. [in Yoruba] Did you hear?
translation.es: Estoy ocupado con mis propios sueños.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Don't you have a shirt? Why are you wearing that shirt?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te pusiste una camisa?

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Are you now ashamed of where Lagos Island?
[in Yoruba] Gutter trash who've never seen wealth before.
[in Yoruba] Just look at them. Rubbish.
Didn't I tell you not to wear this shirt?
translation.es: Era mejor no usar esa camiseta.

translation.en: I'd like to sign up for the scholarship exam.
Pay the registration fee of 150,000 naira.
The entry exam is not free.
translation.es: El examen de ingreso no es gratis.

translation.en: Don't you want to give it to someone that can't actually afford to pay?
translation.es: ¿No se la quieren dar a alguien pobre?

translation.en: Can she write the exam now and pay for it later when she gets the scholarship?
translation.es: ¿No puede tomar el examen y pagarlo cuando le den la beca?

translation.en: [woman] This is Wilmer Academy… [in Yoruba] …not Lagos Island Secondary School.
translation.es: Esta es la Academia Wilmer, no la Secundaria Isla de Lagos.

translation.en: [in English] It's fine, Lala. Let's go.
Your smile lights up the entire room.
[Rahila] Dreaming is destructive. My dreams are unrealistic.
translation.es: Soñar es nocivo. Mis sueños no son realistas.

translation.en: [Ishaya] Lala, that doesn't even make sense.
[in Pidgin] Dad wanting to be a famous artist lost us our brother.
translation.es: Quería ser un artista famoso y por eso murió nuestro hermano.

translation.en: Now he's in pain every time.
[in English] Maybe Daddy will actually stop being in pain
if he starts doing what he loves, just painting.
translation.es: si hace lo que ama: pintar.

translation.en: That's why, me, I'm chasing my dream.
Lala, just because you can't get into Wilmer
translation.es: Lala, que no ingreses a esa escuela

translation.en: doesn't mean you can't be the neuro…
translation.es: no significa que no puedas ser neuro…

translation.en: whatever doctor you decide you want to be.
translation.es: La clase de médica que quieres ser.

translation.en: Wilmer is not the only school in Lagos.
You shut up your dirty mouth.
[in English] He broke my number-one rule.

translation.es: Baido, dáselo de comer a Angel.
Baido, dáselo de comer a Angel.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] The weed is selling, but…
[in Pidgin] You need to know the name.
[in English] Ijoba, Rush is our business.
translation.es: Ijoba. Rush es nuestro negocio. ¿Por qué vender pastillas?

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Why are you selling pills?
translation.es: Rush es nuestro negocio. ¿Por qué vender pastillas?

translation.en: This will attract rich young people.
translation.es: Esto atraerá a los jóvenes ricos.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] You and I know this business is not new.
[Ijoba in English] I will continue to develop new markets.
[in Yoruba] You're losing your mind, Government.
[in English] Sell the pills, Joe, or don't come back.
translation.es: Vende las pastillas, Joe. O no vuelvas.

translation.en: [Patricia in Yoruba] He's still in pain.
[nurse on phone] Bring him in. [in English] But you have to pay your bills before we treat him.
translation.es: Tráelo. Pero debes pagar antes de que lo tratemos.

translation.en: [neighbor in Yoruba] Sorry about your dad.
but it was worse this time around, so we had to rush him to the hospital.
translation.es: pero más fuerte, así que lo llevamos al hospital.

translation.en: [Ishaya in Yoruba] Why didn't you call me?
[Rahila in English] You didn't pick up.
[Ishaya] How much do we owe the hospital now?
The medicine they said we should buy for your father,
I've bought them. And the remaining money, we'll use it for our house rent.
translation.es: La compré, y el resto del dinero será para pagar la renta.

translation.en: Mummy, please give me back my money.
Mummy, this is the money for the apprenticeship in London.
translation.es: Mamá, es para ser aprendiz en Londres.

translation.en: The money I need to use to travel.
Mummy, please, just give me back the rest of my money. Please.
translation.es: Dame el resto del dinero, por favor.

translation.en: With all we are going through in this family,
[in Pidgin] Isn't it the same evil money you are using to treat him?
translation.es: ¿De ahí no viene el dinero que usas para tratarlo?

translation.en: -Give me my money. -[in Yoruba] How dare you talk that way!
[Ishaya] It's for three months now! Just three months!
[in Yoruba] Get out of my sight.
[in Pidgin] Lala, you did this to me?
[Michael in Pidgin] Who's that? How are you, Adufe?
[in English] Rahila told me what happened.
translation.es: Rahila me contó lo que pasó.

translation.en: [Michael in Pidgin] How would you go about it?
My guy, you must be kidding.
translation.es: Viejo… No debes hablar en serio.

translation.en: You neither have a passport nor visa…
And you don't even have enough for the ticket yet.
translation.es: No tienes para pagar el vuelo aún.

translation.en: I'm not going to end up like my father, sad because I have forsaken my dreams.
translation.es: No terminaré triste como mi papá por renunciar a mis sueños.

translation.en: He saw my work, liked it, and chose me.
translation.es: Él vio mi obra, le gustó y me eligió.

translation.en: You're planning to leave the country and didn't tell me?
translation.es: ¿Planeas irte y no me lo dijiste?

translation.en: I thought we would get married.

translation.es: - No puedo casarme con nadie así. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: Babe, that's not what I said.
translation.es: Cariño, no es lo que dije.

translation.en: -I didn't mean it that way. -Bless you.
translation.es: - No quise que sonara así. - Adiós.

translation.en: Oga Rambo wants to see you in his VIP spot.
translation.es: El jefe quiere verte en la zona VIP.
Lo que el rey no tiene…
y este collar de ahogo de oro.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Don't choke her too much.
[in Yoruba] Hey, boy, change some dollars for me, I need more money, okay?
translation.es: Chico, cámbiame unos dólares. Necesito más dinero.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Check that place for the money.
[man 1 in Yoruba] Bring me this money. It'd better be complete.
translation.es: Tráeme todo el dinero sin que falte nada.

translation.en: [Oga Rambo] Dollar Boy! Bring me liquor!
What's wrong with you? What do you think you're doing?
You don't get to ask me that after you treated me like that.
translation.es: No tienes derecho a preguntar después de tratarme así.

translation.en: [in English] See, for your information, Oga Rambo, he has treated me better than you ever did, you hear me?
translation.es: Oga Rambo me trata mejor de lo que tú me trataste, ¿bueno?

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Have you ever asked me what I want out of life?
translation.es: ¿Me preguntaste qué quiero en la vida?

translation.en: You don't think I deserve it, but I do.
translation.es: No crees que lo merezca, pero así es.

translation.en: [Ishaya] Sir, a customer wants to change money. Get ten bundles, put it in that bag.
translation.es: - El cliente quiere cambiar dinero. - Pon diez fajos en esa bolsa.

translation.en: [Ijoba] We need new market for the molly ASAP.
[Essien on video] You have been selected as one of my apprentices in London.
translation.es: Te escogieron para ser uno de mis aprendices en Londres.

translation.en: [Ishaya] Look, I'm too busy following my own dreams.
translation.es: Estoy ocupado con mis propios sueños.

translation.en: Will it take you a million years to count ten fucking bundles?
[in Yoruba] You're obsessed with music. All day long, it's music! Why?
translation.es: Te obsesiona la música. Todo el día escuchas música. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: But, Daddy, I can pass it on my own.
to be the managing director of Five Star Realty,
translation.es: Ser el director de Five Star Realty
y venderles mansiones a los multimillonarios.

translation.en: And you know where those billionaires are? Wilmer Academy.
translation.es: ¿Sabes dónde están ellos? En la Academia Wilmer.

translation.en: I need you to memorize those answers,
With a scholarship, there's no school fees.
translation.es: Con la beca, no pagamos matrícula.

translation.en: I threw something away by mistake.
What are you looking for now? Shut up. Don't ask such stupid questions.
translation.es: - ¿Qué busca? - Silencio. No hagas preguntas estúpidas.

translation.en: What if I told you I had the answers to Wilmer entrance exams?
translation.es: ¿Y si tengo las respuestas del examen de ingreso a Wilmer?

translation.en: I still don't have the money for the test.
translation.es: No tengo dinero para el examen.

translation.en: What if I told you I had the money for the test too?
I don't think I want to go there by cheating.
translation.es: Si ingreso con trampa, no merezco estudiar ahí.

translation.en: It only means I don't deserve to be there, so, no.
translation.es: Si ingreso con trampa, no merezco estudiar ahí. No.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] You know how much the top student wins?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuánto se gana el mejor alumno?

translation.en: Look at you, I've already registered with 150,000.
Where'd you get the money? Why are you stealing Rahila's dream?
translation.es: ¿Por qué robarle el sueño a Rahila?

translation.en: I asked her, she said she won't cheat to achieve her dream.
translation.es: Dijo que no haría trampa por su sueño.

translation.en: [in English] Me, I'll do anything to get my dream.
translation.es: Yo haría cualquier cosa por el mío.

translation.en: Here, help me learn the answers.
[in English] Number one, B. Number two, C. Number three…
translation.es: Número uno, B. Número dos, C. Número tres…
Treina y ocho: D. Treinta y nueve…

translation.en: [woman] You have 90 minutes. You may begin.
Thank you for choosing Wilmer Academy.
translation.es: Gracias por elegir la Academia Wilmer.

translation.en: I think that was pretty good.
I have to go to church with my mom, but I'll come over later.
translation.es: Debo ir a la iglesia con mamá, pero voy después.

translation.en: [woman on PA] The Wilmer Academy Open Day is a proud tradition
translation.es: Esta invitación a la Academia Wilmer es una tradición

translation.en: where our leaders of tomorrow experience Wilmer for the first time as scholars.
translation.es: para que nuestros futuros líderes vean su vida escolar por primera vez.

translation.en: please make your way into the auditorium, where the program will commence.
translation.es: vayan al auditorio, donde comenzará el programa.

translation.en: [sighs] I'll see you after the tour.
Just read it like you mean it.
[Gemade] And I know this year will be one of the best years
translation.es: Sé que este año será uno de los mejores

translation.en: I'd like to call on the great-granddaughter of the founder
translation.es: quisiera pedirle a la nieta del fundador

translation.en: to welcome her fellow students to the new academic year.
translation.es: que les dé la bienvenida a este nuevo año académico.

translation.en: My name is Carmen Wilmer Willoughby.
-I'm a descendant of the founding father. -This babe is fine!
translation.es: - Soy descendiente del fundador. - Está bien.

translation.en: Sorry, but I don't see it.
It's an honor to welcome you all to the new academic session.
translation.es: Es un honor darles la bienvenida a este nuevo año.

translation.en: And anyone who dates Atlas is definitely not a good person.
translation.es: Quien salga con Atlas no es buena persona.

translation.en: What, like the map of the world?
I'd like to introduce someone special.
This year, we started a scholarship program,
translation.es: Este año comenzamos un programa de becas

translation.en: which is sponsored by Pastor Okolo.
the first recipient who had a perfect score.
translation.es: Permítanme presentarles al primer becado, quien obtuvo un puntaje perfecto.

translation.en: [Frank] I can't believe you're the scholarship student.
I came second in the exam.
Hey. You want a picture with the scholarship student, right?
translation.es: Quieres una foto con el becado, ¿no?

translation.en: [Atlas] Put this thing on the wall properly now.
-That's now how you-- -[Carmen] Atlas! Hey, babe.
Atlas, we're too old for this.
That's why he followed me all the way to Wilmer, right?
translation.es: Por eso me siguió a Wilmer, ¿no?

translation.en: Yes, but the full thing is Frankincense, right?
[in Pidgin] Madam Tour Guide, can we focus on why we're here?
[in English] Or is your boyfriend what we're here to see?
translation.es: o vinimos a conocer a tu novio?
Para que lo sepas, me llamo Carmen y es por aquí.
me llamo Carmen y es por aquí.

translation.en: Put this thing on the wall properly now.
And this is the brand-new art gallery.
translation.es: Esta es la galería de arte nueva.

translation.en: I want to be an artist, Mummy, like Daddy.
translation.es: Mamá, quiero ser artista como papá.

translation.en: [Patricia] But you know art is forbidden in this house.
translation.es: Sabes que el arte está prohibido aquí.

translation.en: You really need to learn how not to touch without permission.
As soon as we receive your transcript from your secondary school.
translation.es: Cuando reciba el expediente de tu secundaria.
La escuela comienza el próximo lunes.

translation.en: so please bring it to us by then.
[man] I thought you were so stupid you couldn't memorize the answers,
translation.es: Pensé que eras imbécil por no memorizarlas,

translation.en: 'cause you threw it away, and now the cleaner's son got the scholarship.
translation.es: porque las tiraste y el de la limpieza obtuvo la beca.

translation.en: I wanted to prove that I could do it on my own.
translation.es: Quería probar que podía hacerlo solo.

translation.en: You are an idiot if you think anyone can achieve anything honestly in this world!
translation.es: ¡Eres imbécil si crees que la gente logra algo de forma honesta!

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Get out of my sight!
[in English] Get the hell out of my sight. Nonsense.
Go and ask that thief you call a son.
translation.es: Pregúntale por qué al ladrón de tu hijo.

translation.en: [Ishaya in Pidgin] Bro AB, I know I owe you money. Please, just let me run this package.
translation.es: Te debo dinero, pero ayúdame con un documento.

translation.en: [in English] Whatever it is, my answer is no.
[in Pidgin] My guy, please, this is very important.
Please, it's just this document I need help with.
as soon as you get the scholarship money,
translation.es: Págame con lo de la beca,

translation.en: return it, because it's my office contribution.
I beg you in the name of God.
[Atlas] Mum, this is the tenth time I'm calling you. Call me back.
translation.es: Mamá, es la décima vez que te llamo. Devuélveme la llamada.

translation.en: I can't apply for the London Art Institute grant if my school fees aren't paid.
translation.es: Debemos pagar la escuela para pedir la beca del Instituto de Arte de Londres.

translation.en: I can't keep living at Reggie's house. It's like I'm homeless.
translation.es: No puedo seguir en la casa de Reggie. Me siento como un indigente.

translation.en: Can you imagine that useless man named Allen…
translation.es: Imagínate que el inútil de Allen…

translation.en: -Uh-huh? -[in English] You know, his school is now participating in the London Art Institute grant?
translation.es: Su escuela está participando en la beca del Instituto de Arte de Londres.

translation.en: -I thought that was exclusive to us. -Apparently not.
translation.es: - Pensé que era solo para nosotros. - No.

translation.en: -[Mrs. Willoughby] Oh, Atlas! -I see you have a new Essien on your wall.
translation.es: - Buenos días. - ¡Atlas! Vi que tiene un nuevo Essien en la pared.

translation.en: One day very soon, we'll have an Atlas original when you win the grant.
translation.es: En poco tiempo, cuando te ganes la beca, tendremos un Atlas original.

translation.en: Your friend has come to carry you to school, so Mummy said-- Tell Mummy to come now!
translation.es: - Su amigo vino por usted. Su mamá… - ¡Que venga mamá!

translation.en: -You mean I should tell her-- -Tell her to come now!
-I'll be right back. -[Mr. Willoughby] Oh, dear.
You don't need any more painkillers. Only people in pain need it.
translation.es: No necesitas más analgésicos. Son para el dolor.

translation.en: Even Dr. Olaoye says you don't need pills.
translation.es: La Dra. Olaoye dice que no los necesitas.

translation.en: -It's been a year-- -Neither you nor her shattered your leg!
translation.es: - Pasó un año… - Ustedes no se rompieron la pierna.

translation.en: People are watching, waiting for you to have a breakdown.
translation.es: La gente te observa y espera a que tengas una crisis.

translation.en: You're a Wilmer Willoughby, my daughter.
translation.es: Eres una Wilmer Willoughby, mi hija.

translation.en: It feels like I have no control over my life.
translation.es: Siento que no tengo control sobre mi vida.

translation.en: She even took my painkillers. I don't get it.
translation.es: Me quitó las pastillas. No lo entiendo.

translation.en: Is it her pain? Ugh. I can't wait to leave this house.
translation.es: ¿Le duele a ella? Ya quiero irme de esta casa.

translation.en: you and I'll be eating caviar and drinking champagne along the Thames.
translation.es: tú y yo estaremos comiendo caviar y tomando champán en el Támesis.

translation.en: -Mum! Finally! I've been trying to-- -[woman] Hello, Atlas.
Your mother is still in Paris. She'll give you a call later.
translation.es: Tu mamá sigue en París. Te llamará después.

translation.en: -Babe, are you okay? What's wrong? -[tires squealing]
I have to get someone to call your school's records office
translation.es: Le pediré a alguien que llamé a tu escuela

translation.en: the school, their phone lines are down.
So they gave me, um, a phone number that you can call in case you need to verify.
translation.es: Me dieron un número al que puede llamar por si necesita comprobar algo.

translation.en: Sorry. Just write it down for you here.
translation.es: Lo siento. Voy a escribirlo aquí.

translation.en: If it isn't the royal couple of Wilmer Academy.
translation.es: La realeza de la Academia Wilmer.

translation.en: Car, you ready for your welcome back party this weekend?
translation.es: Car, ¿lista para tu fiesta de regreso?

translation.en: Why? Oh, my bad! It was a surprise?
[Atlas] Babe, I can cancel if it's too much.
[sighs] No. It's probably what I need.
May God be with you too as we accomplish His new mission.
translation.es: Que Dios te acompañe también mientras cumplimos su misión.

translation.en: Now that we are all gathered together,
I have a very special "Welcome back to Wilmer" package just for you, Car.
translation.es: te tengo un paquete especial para celebrar tu regreso, Car.

translation.en: Yeah, man, I got the Holy Grail of kush all for Car's first day.
translation.es: La mejor cepa kush para el primer día de Car.

translation.en: My secretary has your uniforms and schedule.
translation.es: Te darán tus uniformes y horario.

translation.en: Um, so, my prize money, where is it?
You can collect it at the end of the day from the bursar.
translation.es: Recógela al final del día en Tesorería.

translation.en: Good thing secondhand smoking is a thing, so just breathe in, Car, baby.
translation.es: Da igual para los fumadores pasivos. Respira y ya, Car.

translation.en: If this is about last week, I told you, I had a church thing.
translation.es: Si es por lo de la semana pasada, debía ir a la iglesia.

translation.en: Nen, this is about the last few months,
translation.es: No, es sobre los últimos meses.

translation.en: and a quick puff-puff-pass is not going to fix it.
translation.es: Un porrito no va a arreglarlo.

translation.en: Can you guys please not fuck up my high?
Is that shit because I'm a year behind now?
Good God, Carmen. Reggie, please, light one up for this girl.
translation.es: Por Dios, Carmen. Reggie, dale un porro.

translation.en: Babe, you think maybe it's because of the pills?
-Are you deaf? I said get the-- -[Nen] Hey, let's go.
Everyone is, and no one else is late, Mr. Scholarship.
translation.es: Nadie más llegó tarde, señor becado.

translation.en: Can you get somewhere to sit?
Who can tell me the ninth one?
I have listed eight out of nine…
-For helping me tie my tie. -[woman exclaims] Oh, my God.
translation.es: Por lo de la corbata. ¡Por Dios!

translation.en: I'm Zina. I know you're Ishaya. And you are?
translation.es: Me llamo Zina. Tú eres Ishaya. ¿Y tú?

translation.en: [Zina] Hi, it's nice to meet you guys.
Today we're going to discuss the plans for the semester,
translation.es: Hoy hablaremos de los planes para el semestre.

translation.en: so no need for your pencils.
This year we're also doing something very different
translation.es: Este año haremos algo muy distinto

translation.en: for the London Art Institute grant.
translation.es: para la beca del Instituto de Arte.

translation.en: Now, everyone can participate, but only three students,
translation.es: Todos pueden participar, pero solo tres estudiantes,

translation.en: one from your year and two from the second year,
translation.es: uno de su año y dos del segundo año,

translation.en: will be submitting directly to the London Art Institute.
translation.es: enviarán su obra directamente al Instituto de Arte de Londres.

translation.en: Now, to select the students, I will be giving you all an assignment.
translation.es: Les daré una tarea para seleccionar a los estudiantes.

translation.en: I look forward to seeing your submission for the shortlist.
translation.es: Espero tu trabajo para la preselección.

translation.en: I don't think I'll be submitting anything.
After removing the cost of books and uniform,
translation.es: Tras restar el costo de los libros y el uniforme,

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Michael, I was given 5,000 naira.
I was given 5,000 naira, what do I do?
took me in and raised me.
we were left on our own,
You can ask your father, who knew us before we started our business
translation.es: Pregúntale a tu papá, que nos conocía antes de comenzar nuestro negocio

translation.en: [in Yoruba] You think we are so stupid that we don't have cameras
translation.es: ¿Nos crees tan idiotas como para no tener cámaras en la sala del dinero?
como para no tener cámaras en la sala del dinero?

translation.en: [in English] Brother Government, Brother Rambo, please, I'll pay you--
[in Pidgin] Please, I'll pay you back, I just need a little time.
translation.es: Les pagaré. Solo necesito un poco de tiempo.

translation.en: Please, a little time-- [Ijoba in Yoruba] Government, Angel is hungry.
translation.es: - Un poco. - Ijoba, Angel tiene hambre.

translation.en: [Ishaya sobs in Pidgin] I'll pay you back, I just need just a little time.
translation.es: Les pagaré. Solo necesito un poco de tiempo.

translation.en: Or your sister will clear your debt in our private rooms.
translation.es: O tu hermana pagará tu deuda en nuestras salas privadas.

translation.en: No. No, take me, I'll follow you.
translation.es: No, llévenme a mí. Iré con ustedes.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Woman, no man will pay anything to look at you.
[Ishaya in Pidgin] Please, please, I'll pay the money. I just need time.
translation.es: Por favor. Les pagaré. Solo necesito tiempo.

translation.en: [Rahila sobs in English] We'll pay your money back, sir, please.
Mummy, don't let them take me! Leave me!
-[shrieks] Leave me! Leave me! -My daughter! My daughter!
-Please, sir! No, don't take her, please! -[Rahila screams] No!
[Ishaya] Mummy, Mummy, Mummy! Don't follow them!
[Oga Rambo in Yoruba] Crazy people, leave my sight.
[in English] I'll pay you back your money. Mr. Government, please!
translation.es: Les pagaré su dinero. Ijoba, por favor.

translation.en: [angrily] You did this… so fix it!
Go look for their money and pay them.
[Patricia] Ishaya, get out of this house now!
